title: Scrivener’s Poppy Seed Dressing
instructions: Place the sugar, dried mustard powder, salt, vinegar and onion juice all together in a large mixing bowl.  Using a whisk, mix all the ingredients together thoroughly then add the oil in a thin stream, very slowly, whisking vigorously and constantly.  Once the mixture is emulsified and thick, stir in the poppy seeds and continue whisking for a few minutes more.
source: Losing Your Bering’s by Karen Haram, Food Section, San Antonio Express-News, March 30, 2005.
